painful as if caused by a sharp instrument

pigeon-breasted.gloss: having a chest deformity marked by a projecting breastbone caused by infantile rickets

pilary.gloss: covered with hairs especially fine soft ones

pillaged.gloss: wrongfully emptied or stripped of anything of value
having been robbed and destroyed by force and violence

pilose.gloss: covered with hairs especially fine soft ones

pilous.gloss: covered with hairs especially fine soft ones

pimpled.gloss: (of complexion) blemished by imperfections of the skin

pimply.gloss: (of complexion) blemished by imperfections of the skin

pinched.gloss: sounding as if the nose were pinched
very thin especially from disease or hunger or cold
not having enough money to pay for necessities

pinkish.gloss: of a light shade of red

piscatorial.gloss: relating to or characteristic of the activity of fishing

piscatory.gloss: relating to or characteristic of the activity of fishing

pitchy.gloss: having the characteristics of pitch or tar

pitiless.gloss: deficient in humane and kindly feelings

pitted.gloss: pitted with cell-like cavities (as a honeycomb)

piously.gloss: in a devout and pious manner

pitiably.gloss: in a manner arousing sympathy and compassion
